arts.ttl: Udinese and Cagliari aiming to bounce back
arts.sum: The Bianconeri have lost their last two matches – at home to AC Milan and away to Sassuolo – while the Sardinians, after two wins against Parma and Lecce, were defeated by Inter last time out. There are already 8 Cagliari players who have scored in this initial phase of the 2025/26 season, considering Serie A and Coppa Italia.

arts.ttl: Longo: Milan to scout defender during Udinese-Cagliari with January move possible
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller After a successful start to the season, AC Milan are already thinking about how they can strengthen the squad in January, at least according to a report. Massimiliano Allegri and his men currently have four wins to their name, out of a possible five, and currently sit at the top of the standings.
